dialogues.line1: I hope it is not too late. I need to find Nerala as soon as possible
dialogues.line2: and reunite with Omozra.

dialogues.line1: You can move by right clicking where you want to go.
dialogues.line2: You can run by double clicking but only for a short period of time.

dialogues.line1: You can move the camera by approaching your mouse to the edges of the screen
dialogues.line2: OR with WASD. You can rotate it by clicking the mouse wheel and dragging.

dialogues.line1: Spice is used to cast and upgrade your abilities.
dialogues.line2: Your character will automatically pick it if you move close to it.

dialogues.line1: To better avoid being detected, you can enter stealth
dialogues.line2: by pressing shift.

dialogues.line1: Carefull! Enemies will detect you visually and auditory.
You can eliminate enemies with a basic attack or with abilities.
dialogues.line2: Zhib's first ability is a throwable knife, use it to kill the Harkonnen.

dialogues.line1: Zhib's second ability is a Decoy
dialogues.line2: You can throw it to distract enemies.

dialogues.line1: Zhib's ultimate ability can kill entire groups of enemies.
dialogues.line2: Be careful to not abuse it, spice is scarce.

dialogues.line1: Nerala's first ability is a sleeping dart.
dialogues.line2: Enemies under its effects will have a harder time detecting you.

dialogues.line1: Nerala's second ability is a smoke bomb.
dialogues.line2: Enemies will not detect you inside the smoke.

dialogues.line1: Nerala's ultimate ability is the Hunter Seeker.
dialogues.line2: It can kill enemies on contact, and also scout large areas.

dialogues.line1: But be carefull, enemies should not detect it or it will be destroyed.
Omozra's first ability is a heal.
dialogues.line2: It consumes charges.

dialogues.line1: You can get more charges by eating corpses with the worm.
dialogues.line2: To do so, right click a corpse with Omozra

dialogues.line1: Omozra's second ability will let you kill enemies safely.
dialogues.line2: Keep it mind that it also needs charges to be used.

dialogues.line1: Omozra's ultimate ability will will let you teleport Zhib or Nerala.
dialogues.line2: It can be very useful to catch enemies off guard.

dialogues.line1: Probably shouldn't engage these enemies head on without some backup.
There are sounds of a struggle going on coming from there.
dialogues.line2: That could be Nerala!

dialogues.line1: What happened here?
(Through the speaking device) It's too late, when I arrived they
dialogues.line2: ambushed me. We need to move, Rabban is still in the camp.

dialogues.line1: This is unacceptable, you can't put the sietch in danger because of an outburst
dialogues.line2: of bravery. This can not be overlooked Nerala, not at a time like this.

dialogues.line1: I understand, but sometimes you have to take risks.
dialogues.line2: I will take full responsibility for my actions.

dialogues.line1: But I will finish what I came here to do.
WE will finish what you started. Give me all the intel.
Putting it simply, Rabban was sighted nearby supervising the reconnaissance
dialogues.line2: mission himself, they are too close to our home, now is the time to end this.

dialogues.line1: Hmm, that must be the camp entrance, come on, follow me, Omozra shouldn't be
dialogues.line2: too far from here, and I dont belive he would be so naive as to enter alone

dialogues.line1: I thought that after all those attacks, your kind you would be a force
dialogues.line2: to be reckoned. But you are nothing more than insects. Rats trying to steal

dialogues.line1: the food from us, the great harkonnen. I will enjoy killing every single
dialogues.line2: ant in that filthy burrow of yours.

dialogues.line1: No... It's a trap! Make haste! we are in serious problems. We should have
dialogues.line2: thought about this, now due to our own stupidity we led them straight to our home.

dialogues.line1: That is not possible, they would have to follow us to find Sannara, or
dialogues.line2: get the information from the source... oh no, our man.

dialogues.line1: They just needed directions and few indications. They tortured our brothers,
dialogues.line2: and they plan to do the same thing to our families. To the thopter, now!

dialogues.line1: You just unlocked a new character! Nerala is now available
dialogues.line2: You can switch between her and Zhib by pressing X and Z respectively

dialogues.line1: Good to see you, I managed to find Nerala, have you and Sadiq gathered new info?
How have you have you been brother? Ah, Nerala, sister, glad you didn't get killed
dialogues.line2: Did you cause a mess as always?

dialogues.line1: Anoying as always, wurm lover, I am ok, thanks for asking
Focus both of you, can you tell us anything about the camp, Omozra?
You passed through a camp entrance that was heavily guarded on your way here, no?
dialogues.line2: Well, Sadiq tells me that ogre is there, preparing his ship to leave somewhere.

dialogues.line1: Let's go, focus and be ready!
You just unlocked a new character! Omozra is now available
dialogues.line2: His designed key is C, to switch to him
